amendment.description: Amendment directs the GAO to include in its FHA report an analysis on the effectiveness of HUD's loss mitigation home retention options in assisting individuals, particularly low income borrowers, in avoiding home foreclosure for mortgages.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 111-503 to direct the GAO to include in its FHA report an analysis on the effectiveness of HUD's loss mitigation home retention options in assisting individuals, particularly low income borrowers, in avoiding home foreclosure for mortgages.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Clarke amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
